nodes.text: The Droidome was a type of virtual reality game where a user could have the opportunity of experiencing the sensation of being a droid. The user would have the temporary appearance and persona of a droid, with the choices ranging from security, construction, translator and engineer droid.

Most droids found the attraction obscene and unrealistic. They believed that the game did not present an accurate picture of the hardships a real droid goes through, such as casual disposal or dismemberment.
